DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the timeframe (relative to a stress task) that is most effective at attenuating the increase in symptoms of tobacco craving and withdrawal that occur when smokers are presented with stressful situations.
DOC.brief_title: Medicinal Nicotine for Preventing Stress Induced Craving and Withdrawal Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Smoking an average of at least 10 cigarette per day General good health unstable medical or psychiatric conditions history of severe motion sickness women who are pregnant or breast feeding The investigators will evaluate if there are other reasons why someone may not participate
